search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as counter where `telegraf_index` metric_name=net.err_out host=* by interface span=1s | streamstats current=f last(counter) as counter_prev by interface | eval err_out=((counter-counter_prev)) | where NOT (err_out<0) | timechart useother=f limit=45 minspan=1m bins=1000 sum(err_out) as err_out by interface
